monogr.title: Baculum geodæticum, sive viaticum. Or The geodeticall staffe : containing eight bookes: the contents whereof followe after the epistles. Newly deuised, practised, and published by Arthur Hopton gentleman
monogr.author: Hopton, Arthur, 1587 or 8-1614
monogr.extent: 16, 75, 1, 81-112, 109-347, that is 374, 10 pages, 1 folded plates, 3 folded tables, illustrations (woodcuts), 4°

div.head: Errata.
div.p: PAg 3 line 26. for graduator read graduation, p. 7 l. 17, for please the, r. please of the, p. 8. l. 6.8 for Dr. R: p. 9 l. 18 for 4 read D, p. 9 l. 26 for Q Nr. Q W, p. 10 l. 5 for Br. O, p. 11 l. 23 for deriuation, r. graduation, p. 11 l. 4 for the description r. the end of the description, p. 14 l. 12 for other of r. to the kind of, p. 17 l. 19 for adumbiatr. abumbrat, P. 18. li. 12. for equall read equat, p. 18 l. 29 for other where r. otherwise p. 18 l. 40 for lacob and r. lacobs staffe and, p. 23 l. 3 for spoked r. spoken, P. 24 l. 3 for foode. r foote, p. 37 I. 11 for vntill the point r. till he point, p. 3 • l. 7 for let NAB, r. let A B, p 4 • l 7 for all r. al vaies, p. 50 l. 21 foreightr. right, p. 56 l. 17 for I take, r must be out. p. 64 l. 4 for 29 r. 28 p. 72 l. 1 for ACK r. G E I, p. 363 l. 7 for E F r. E I. p. 363 l. 7 for declination r. declinano.
Scheames or figures misplaced or omitted.

Fel. 55 l. 17 scheame in the 22 Chap. fol. 93 chap 17 scheame in the chap. 7 l. 4 fol. 151 pro 2 place the figure in the 3 pro. fol. 151 pro. 3 place the scheame in the 2, pro. fol. 165 scheame in the 24 chap. fol. 347 chap, 21 the figure in the chap 17 fol 360 scheame in the 357 fol.

These fault is be something generall and not well to be reformed by the Printer, as in the second broke their is many pictures of Castles, Treas, &c. printed in diuers scheames and there and else where, some letters omitted and others mistaken, which the discreete reader will best correct.
